comments.content:
1: looks like a Garamond to me so may be [Garamond](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724073645/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/garamond) from Adobe  
2: looks like [DeVinne](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724073645/http:/typophile.com/node/99936); some of [its digitizations](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724073645/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/de+vinne);  
3: a revival of [Bernase Roman](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724073645/http:/e-daylight.jp/design/fonts/type/b/bernase-roman.html), possibly [Hawthorn](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724073645/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/hawthorn-lt)  
4: could be [Optima](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724073645/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/optima)
